title: gloo backend stops working when build with DGLOO_USE_GPUDIRECT
body_html:
this is related to merged pull request #2827, when install pytorch with DGLOO_USE_GPUDIRECT enabled, got the following error when using distributed.all_reduce

File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/distributed/__init__.py", line 212, in all_reduce
    return torch._C._dist_all_reduce(tensor, op, group)
RuntimeError: [enforce fail at /home/ubuntu/git/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:103] rv != -1. -1 vs -1. Invalid argument
